tasks.description: The bar chart shows the number of cars per 1000 people in 5 European countries in 3 years and compares with the European average.

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: These days, a great number of children prefer spending time on computer games rather than on sports. Why Is it a positive or negative development?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
